Roadless USA
========================================================

This Markdown file accompanies the handout for the USCOTS 2013 workshop on Teaching Statistics Using R (Horton, Kaplan and Pruim).

```{r}
source("http://www.math.smith.edu/~nhorton/roadless.R")
```

Let's display our 20 locations that were generated

```{r fig.width=7, fig.height=6}
myroadless
```

Now run each of the following blocks, keeping track of your results as you go.

getLocation(1)
